| HistoryText             = Finding [[Jack Russell (Earth-616)|Werewolf]] amongst the [[Braineaters (Earth-616)|Braineaters]] [[Werewolves|werewolf]] biker gang after having faced him the previous night in combat, [[Isaiah Curwen (Earth-616)|Isaiah Curwen]] called upon the Sword to mobilize,{{r|Marvel Comics Presents #57}} thereafter catching up with and beginning an attack on the Braineaters with their silver armaments.{{r|Marvel Comics Presents #58}} At the end of the conflict, Russell, as Werewolf, bit deep into Curwen before he left him. Curwen and his followers believed that he had now become "tainted," "unclean." His Sword of the Lord then seemed to turn on their leader, but details are not known beyond the fact that he survived.{{r|Marvel Comics Presents #59}}
